description:
As a user of the fishing waters application
  I want the application to load data reliably
  So that I can access fishing water information without issues

elements.name: Successful data loading on application start

steps.name: I open the fishing waters application
I should see a loading indicator
the fishing water data should load within 5 seconds
the map should display with markers

elements.name: Handle network error during data loading

steps.name: the network connection is unavailable
I open the fishing waters application
I should see an error message "Failed to load fishing water data"
I should see a "Retry" button
the data loading has failed
the network connection is now available
I click the "Retry" button
the loading indicator should appear
the fishing water data should load successfully
the error message should disappear
the application supports multiple regions
the application loads
it should fetch data for all configured regions
combine them into a single dataset
display all waters on the map
some fishing water data is corrupted
the application loads the data
it should skip the corrupted entries
display the valid fishing waters
log a warning about skipped entries

name: Data Loading

description:
As a fishing enthusiast
  I want to view fishing waters on an interactive map
  So that I can explore different fishing locations

elements.name: Display all fishing waters on initial load

steps.name: the application has loaded map data
the following fishing waters are available:
I open the fishing waters map
I should see a map centered on Sweden
I should see 3 fishing water markers on the map
all markers should be visible
the application has loaded map data
the following fishing waters are available:
I have opened the fishing waters map
I select "Pike" from the species filter
I should see only 1 fishing water marker
the marker should represent "Lake Vänern"
the application has loaded map data
the following fishing waters are available:
I have opened the fishing waters map
I select "Salmon" from the species filter
I select "Trout" from the species filter
I should see 2 fishing water markers
the markers should represent "Lake Vättern" and "Mörrumsån"
the application has loaded map data
the following fishing waters are available:
I have filtered the map to show only "Pike" waters
I clear all species filters
I should see all 3 fishing water markers again

name: Map Display

description:
As a fishing enthusiast
  I want to see detailed information about fishing waters
  So that I can make informed decisions about where to fish

elements.name: Display water information when clicking a marker

steps.name: the application has loaded fishing water data
I have the map open with fishing waters
I click on the "Lake Vänern" marker
the side panel should open
I should see "Lake Vänern" as the title
I should see the species "Pike, Perch"
I should see the region "Västra Götaland"
the application has loaded fishing water data
the side panel is open showing "Lake Vänern"
I click the close button
the side panel should close
no water information should be displayed

elements.name: Update panel when selecting different water

steps.name: the application has loaded fishing water data
the side panel is open showing "Lake Vänern"
I click on the "Lake Vättern" marker
the side panel should update
I should see "Lake Vättern" as the title
I should see the species "Trout, Salmon"
the application has loaded fishing water data
there is a water with incomplete data
I click on a marker with missing information
the side panel should open
I should see "Unknown Water" as the title
I should see "No species information available" for species

name: Side Panel Information Display

description:
As a fishing enthusiast
  I want to filter fishing waters by fish species
  So that I can find waters containing specific fish I want to catch

elements.name: Display all available species in filter

steps.name: the following species are available in the system:
I view the species filter
I should see all 5 species as filter options
no species should be selected by default
the following species are available in the system:
I select "Pike" from the species filter
"Pike" should be highlighted as selected
the other species should remain unselected
the following species are available in the system:
I select "Pike" from the species filter
I select "Perch" from the species filter
both "Pike" and "Perch" should be highlighted as selected
I should see 2 selected species indicated
the following species are available in the system:
I have selected "Pike" and "Perch"
I click on "Pike" again
"Pike" should no longer be selected
only "Perch" should remain selected
the following species are available in the system:
I have selected "Pike", "Perch", and "Trout"
I click the "Clear all" button
no species should be selected
all species should be available for selection

elements.name: Species filter updates map in real-time

steps.name: the following species are available in the system:
the map shows 10 fishing waters
I select "Salmon" from the species filter
the map should immediately update
only waters containing "Salmon" should be visible

name: Species Filter
